articles.title: Cannes: Harrison Ford “Flattered and Uncommonly Reflective” After Career Tribute, Is as Busy as Ever (Exclusive) - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The 80-year-old legend, who received an honorary Palme d'Or last Thursday, sat down with THR to discuss his new film 'Indiana Jones and the Dial of Destiny,' his Emmy-contending TV shows 'Shrinking' and '1923' and why his motto is "Keep moving."
articles.content:

articles.content:
